person.persName: Bartholomew J. Scott (Smithland, Lyon County, Kentucky, teacher and lieutenant)

body.p: Smithland, Lyon County, Kentucky, teacher and soldier. Kentucky native. Teacher in Lyon, Kentucky, in 1860. Enrolled in the 20th Kentucky Infantry (U.S.A.) on October 24, 1861. Promoted from private to Sergeant on October 1, 1862. Promoted to 1st Sergeant on November 1, 1862. Promoted to Sergeant Major in March 1863. Transferred as 2nd Lieutenant to Company H, 20th Kentucky Infantry, on August 23, 1863.
